Versatile and stylish, the izod advantage performance polo combines comfort, quality, and fit. This own-it-in-every-color men’s polo is designed for everyday wear with a classic 2-button placket, subtly darker trim, and a roll-resistant collar. Featuring a regular cut, our short-sleeve polo shirt for men is crafted from a naturally stretchy and cooling fabric with UV-15 sun protection that pulls moisture from the skin and dries quickly for added comfort. Our polo is made from a breathable blend of 60% cotton and 40% polyester with sport flex technology that allows the lightweight fabric to move with you for maximum flexibility.
